mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO dt_insurecfm_fb ( tradeNo, orderNo, applySeq, responseCode, responseMessage, printNo, proposalNo, policyNo, startDate, endDate, amount, premium, comCode, comName, comAddress, comPostCode, comPhoneNumber, handler, salesName, appliName, identifyNumber, identifyType, identifyPeriod, birthDay, age, sex, insuredIdentity, appliAddress, mobile, email, account, accountNo, bank, insuredName, insuredIdentifyNumber, insuredIdentifyType, insuredIdentifyPeriod, insuredBirthDay, insuredAge, insuredSex, appliIdentity, insuredAddress, postCode, insuredPhoneNumber, occupationCode, insuredMobile, insuredEmail,
ePolicyURL, createTime ) VALUES
( #{it.tradeNo}, #{it.orderNo}, #{it.applySeq}, #{it.responseCode}, #{it.responseMessage}, #{it.printNo}, #{it.proposalNo}, #{it.policyNo}, #{it.startDate}, #{it.endDate}, #{it.amount}, #{it.premium}, #{it.comCode}, #{it.comName}, #{it.comAddress}, #{it.comPostCode}, #{it.comPhoneNumber}, #{it.handler}, #{it.salesName}, #{it.appliName}, #{it.identifyNumber}, #{it.identifyType}, #{it.identifyPeriod}, #{it.birthDay}, #{it.age}, #{it.sex}, #{it.insuredIdentity}, #{it.appliAddress}, #{it.mobile}, #{it.email}, #{it.account}, #{it.accountNo}, #{it.bank}, #{it.insuredName}, #{it.insuredIdentifyNumber}, #{it.insuredIdentifyType}, #{it.insuredIdentifyPeriod}, #{it.insuredBirthDay}, #{it.insuredAge}, #{it.insuredSex}, #{it.appliIdentity}, #{it.insuredAddress}, #{it.postCode}, #{it.insuredPhoneNumber}, #{it.occupationCode}, #{it.insuredMobile}, #{it.insuredEmail},
#{it.ePolicyURL}, NOW() )
